exec: pm.test('Status 201 for normal create', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(201); });
pm.test('Status 201 for boundary create', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(201); });

item.name: Create Profile - invalid future birth date

exec: pm.test('Future birth date rejected', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('Client id matches stored primary', function () { pm.expect(body.clientId).to.eql(pm.environment.get('mobileClientPrimary')); });
pm.test('Boundary client profile loads', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test('Goal preserved for boundary client', function () { pm.expect(body.goal).to.eql('BULK'); });
pm.test('Missing plan strategy rejected', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('Name trimmed after update', function () { pm.expect(body.name).to.eql('Alex Updated'); });
pm.test('Future birth date rejected on update', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('BMI numeric value returned', function () { pm.expect(body.bmi).to.be.a('number'); });
pm.test('Boundary BMI request returns 200', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test('Missing header on BMI yields 400', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('Boundary calorie request succeeds', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test('Missing header yields 400 for calories endpoint', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('Bulk strategy message present', function () { pm.expect(body.message || '').to.match(/(Keep bulking|Lean bulk focus looks good)/); });
pm.test('Missing header yields 400 on recommendation', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('Delete boundary profile succeeds', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test('Missing header yields 400 on delete', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(400); });
pm.test('Health endpoint exposes metadata', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(200); });
pm.test('Service name present', function () { pm.expect(body.service).to.eql('Personal Fitness Management Service'); });
pm.test('POST to health not allowed', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(405); });

description.content: Updated tests covering active endpoints with normal, boundary, and invalid scenarios.

exec: pm.test('Status 201 for normal create', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(201); });
pm.test('Status 201 for boundary create', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(201); });

assertions.assertion: Future birth date rejected on update

pm.test('Service name present', function () { pm.expect(body.service).to.eql('Personal Fitness Management Service'); });
